name: Die Wilden Kerle 5: Hinter dem Horizont
name_original: Die Wilden Kerle 5: Hinter dem Horizont
description:
Die Wilden Kerle 5: Hinter dem Horizont is an adventure game developed by Silver Style Entertainment. It came out on 30-10-2008. It was published by The Games Company.
Die Wilden Kerle 5: Hinter dem Horizont is available on PC.
